Name: Fly Me The Flip To France
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A bittersweet flip best enjoyed as a wholesome aperitivo.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2015 by Ben Campbell at the Alchemist in Manchester, England.
